compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and user consent regarding data collection and usage.

compliant.section: 常見問題 - 為什麼要在網站上使用COOKIES?
compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation and necessity of cookies for providing services.

compliant.section: 常見問題 - 我必須接受COOKIES嗎?
compliant.legal provisions: User rights regarding consent and the necessity of cookies for functionality.

compliant.section: 常見問題 - COOKIES包含我的個人資料嗎?
compliant.legal provisions: Clarification on the type of data collected and assurance of non-collection of sensitive information.
Disclosure of third-party cookies and their purposes.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Lack of explicit information on user rights to access, rectify, or delete their data.
non_compliant.amend: Include a section detailing user rights regarding their personal data, including access, rectification, and deletion.

non_compliant.section: 神達有權隨時變更或更新本Cookie政策
non_compliant.legal provisions: Insufficient notice period for changes to the cookie policy.
non_compliant.amend: Specify a notice period for users before changes take effect, ensuring users are adequately informed.
